content.rendered:
Erik Vasquez is an American gangster and he wants to realize his grand plan, within the framework of which he wants to become the top dog of the Mexican underworld. However, he also begins to make enemies among his friends and the powerful cartels.

Director: RJ Collins

Writer: Rich Ronat

Stars: Philippe A. Haddad. Maurice Compte. Maya Stojan
